title: IBomTableAnnotation.IGetAllCustomProperties
description: Gets the list of available custom properties that can be used for a custom properties column in this BOM table annotation.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of strings of available custom properties VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
To get the number of custom properties, use
IBomTableAnnotation::GetAllCustomPropertiesCount
.
The list of available custom properties includes all of the items in the BOM table, which includes items from the file summary items and file custom properties that have been set.
